amendment.description: To establish a National sex offender database available to the public, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4073 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4073 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR 11/20/2004 S11662-11663; text: CR 11/20/2004 S11662-11663) To establish a National sex offender database available to the public, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4073 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4073 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Dorgan.
